reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This Hotel is fantastic. Very Hip and Chic and the decor is very modern.
reviews.title: Beautiful Hotel Furano

reviews.text: The staffs are very attentive and speak great English. They made the stay delightful and our every request was accommodated.
reviews.title: Very trendy and directly across the street from the train station

likes.disliked: — I couldn't figure out how to make a telephone call from the room!
